item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-14
item.description: Facebook execs tease VR prototype hardware with new photos (2 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg and Andrew Bosworth recently posted pictures of themselves wearing prototype headsets and linking the concepts to Facebook’s work on the metaverse.
